short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the appearance on Duolingo to get the look you want.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to change the appearance on Duolingo's sites.

Current features:

Change background colors.
Change font family.
Change font color.
Colors automatically apply on page load.
